Articles.Content:
Done and done.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Next challenge: reach at least 1000m using only SAS and wings as propulsion! hints: you are going to need to either make a gyroscope, or an infiniglider.

1000m? I got to 4400! Is that overkill?

Javascript is disabled. View full album

NEXT CHALLENGE: Kerbals liked a meteor shower, they wanted to make an artificial one. But a capsule impacted kerbin a little fast and had re-entry effects all the way to the ground. Do that! You are allowed to cheat your way there (infinite fuel, hyperedit, ect)

EDIT: Previously suggest challenge is impossible...

So instead, the KSC wants some more scientific progress. Send the first lander to Duna and gather some science!

Edited November 26, 2014 by TJPrime

Have something I quickly threw together:

Jeb stuffed some rocks in the command pod, which is totally enough science for the challenge.

Next challenge: Deorbit some debris (or your fancy station, it doesn't matter) by crashing a missile really hard into it.

(disclaimer: may not actually deorbit debris, but it's the Kerbal way)
What exactly will qualify as a missile in this case? I may have a design that can do the job...

Basically any unmanned rocket you can crash into something that doesn't rely on aerodynamic lift. We don't want to kill any Kerbals, after all!*

*The factual authenticity of this sentence is not guaranteed.
Ah. Excellent...I just have to make sure I've got a piece of space junk available, then.
